name: Mind & Body
description:
Join body and mind in this game made for the Emotions & Feelings Jam, based on the concept of togetherness. Drag and drop different things to your body or mind in a way that makes them meet at the center. There's only one combination that works.

It is unusual for me to feel "complete", to have mind and body together, and when I manage that it is a great feeling. I wanted to put that into a game for this jam. I know that different people will have different experiences and solutions but this is what I can offer from my perspective.
